summary: The video features a full-time mother in Singapore sharing her daily routine, focusing on her daughter's upcoming haircut and various activities throughout the day. The mother discusses her feelings about her daughter's decision to get a shorter haircut, expressing sentimentality about her child's growing up. She mentions planning a trip to Japan and the practicality of a shorter hairstyle for outdoor activities. The video includes scenes of the family taking a train, enjoying a sweet treat, and having a playdate with friends. The mother also takes a relaxing bath with a luxurious salt bath balm, reflecting on her chronic muscle pain and indulging in self-care.
keywords: full-time mom, Singapore, haircut, Japan, outdoor activities, sentimentality, train, French American Bakery, marshmallow hot chocolate, playdate, Danish playgrounds, salt bath balm, chronic muscle pain, self-care
creator_demographic: Age Range: Unknown, Gender: Female, Geographic Location: Singapore
